title: Alex Jones Show - 2014 Mar 03 MO [sebaygo1]
description:
The Alex Jones Show 
Monday, 03 March 2014


[sebaygo1]


Show Description
................
From the Infowars web site :: On this Monday, March 3 edition of The Alex Jones Show, David Knight covers the latest developments on the Ukraine crisis, including Obama's fake brandishing of a telephone during a conversation with Putin, as the establishment media praises the Oscars and its politically correct selection of "12 Years A Slave" as film of the year. 

David also looks at the mayor of London calling for children to be snatched in response to the political beliefs of their parents and other creeping totalitarian aspects of the police state in Britain and the United States. 

Anthony Gucciardi runs down the latest on the FDA and Paul Joseph Watson makes an appearance to talk about the latest on Ukraine and child snatching by the British state.

 It is my opinion that in this time it is virtually
 essential to seek information from a variety of sources, 
 to listen to a spectrum of voices in order to better 
 understand the "big picture." A reliance solely upon
 mainstream corporate media for news and info is a 
 prescription for ignorance. I try to share information
 that counters the monotone of mainstream corporate media.
 
 NOTE: The material here is made available strictly as
 information. Do not assume my support for or endorsement 
 of the contents. 

 Think for yourself!
 To paraphrase the late William Cooper:
